local_intent: Perceive the T-block, move above it at a safe height (3 cm), and verify visibility.
assumptions: Vision can provide a detection handle for 't_block'.
3 cm clearance is safe for approach in this scene.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: retry DetectObject(t_block, 800), then MoveAbove(t_block, 0.03, 1200); adds a minimal post-check via IsObjectVisible for verification.
